content: this chenille plush no-sew pocket pup crochet pattern is the perfect amigurumi project for dog lovers pocket pup crochet along video right hand https //youtu be/wsdsb_anuvy left hand https //youtu be/uil30wn-asu bobble video tutorial right hand https //youtu be/1xrgf1hoxns left hand https //youtu be/ccm2rx30s1s beginners to advanced crocheters can create this pattern with the following techniques -magic_ring -single_crochet -increasing 2 stitches into one stitch -decreasing join 2 stitches into 1 -double_crochet -half_double_crochet -slip_stitch -small bobble -bobble -fastening off this no-sew pattern is written in u s crochet terms complete with clear instructions pictures and a video tutorial to help you along the way pocket pup is crocheted in the round/continuous spirals without joining the rounds i suggest using a stitch marker or different color yarn to keep track of each round pocket pup is crocheted in super bulky chenille yarn and is approximately 3 inches tall be aware that size may vary depending on the yarn and hook size used gauge is not particularly important just be consistent with the gauge you are using and most importantly have fun supplies needed to make pocket pup -super bulky 6 weight yarn i used premier parfait chunky chenille yarn -small amount of worsted weight yarn for the nose -h 5mm crochet hook -two 14mm plastic safety eyes not recommended for children under 3 years old -18mm safety nose -polyfil or stuffing of your choice -yarn needle -scissors -locking stitch markers optional do not distribute sell or share this pattern please feel free to sell the items you make from this shop
